description: A markdown memo app synced with Supabase and Prisma.

memo.browse: Browse your Supabase memos in Markdown view.
memo.noMemosHint: Create your first note from “Create memo”.
memo.noSearchHint: Try another keyword or reset filters.
memo.noCategoryHint: Pick another category or clear filters.
memo.detailEmpty: This memo has no content yet.
memo.editLead: Saving updates the detail and list instantly.
memo.newLead: Saved to Supabase instantly and ready for search and categories. Write in Markdown while previewing on the right.

form.tip: Summarize the title in one line and use Markdown for the body. Live preview on the right.
form.title: Title
form.categoryHelper: Will be saved to Supabase in future (UI prototype).
form.previewEmpty: Type Markdown to see the preview here.

categories.title: Category management
categories.lead: Create, edit, and delete up to {limit} categories to test your taxonomy.
categories.addHint: Prototype only: inputs are stored locally on this page.
categories.name: Name
categories.limitReached: No more categories can be added.
categories.emptyPrompt: Create your first category from “Add category”.

signin.title: Sign in quickly with email link
signin.lead: Enter your registered email to receive a Magic Link. Open it to sign in instantly.
signin.idleHint: The link expires in 10 minutes. Check spam if not received.
signin.success: Verification email sent. Open the link to finish sign-in.
signin.toastDesc: Open the Magic Link from your email to go home.
signin.signupPrompt: If you don't have an account yet, sign up here.

signup.title: Sign up with email
signup.lead: Enter your email to receive a verification link. Opening it completes sign-up.
signup.idleHint: Complete the process within 10 minutes via the email link.
signup.success: Verification email sent. Open the link to finish sign-up.
signup.toastDesc: Check your inbox and open the link within 10 minutes.

callback.loadingNote: This may take a few seconds.
callback.genericError: We couldn't verify your sign-up. Please try the email link again.
